name: Snake Plant
description: Snake plants are hardy and tolerant of low light and infrequent watering, making them perfect for beginners.

name: Spider Plant
description: Spider plants are adaptable and fast-growing, thriving in indirect light and requiring minimal care.

name: Pothos
description: Pothos are low-maintenance with trailing vines and can thrive in a range of lighting conditions.

name: Peace Lily
description: Peace lilies are forgiving and bloom indoors. They prefer moderate light and slightly moist soil.
